name: @fl0/template-nodejs
description: A simple Node.js Express app for getting started on FL0

scripts.create_password: node -e " require('bcrypt').hash(process.argv[1], 15, function(err, hash) { console.log('Your password is: ' , `\x1b[33m ${process.argv[1]}\x1b[0m` , ' and your hash for your app is: ' , `\x1b[33m ${hash}\x1b[0m` ) });"
